scripts.testcomp: npm run compile && npx hardhat test
scripts.testcov: npm run compile && npx hardhat coverage
scripts.deploylocal: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Condominium.ts --network local
scripts.deploysepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Condominium.ts --network sepolia
scripts.deployIgnition:bsc: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Condominium.ts --network bsctest
